rrdworld.name: YaketyStats
rrdworld.author: teamdowntime@yaketystats.org
rrdworld.description: YaketyStats gathers statistics about your *nix systems. It is easy to install, maintain and extend and has has an intuitive, AJAX-powered web interface for graphing data. Graphs are built on the fly, can contain stats from multiple systems and include "Google Maps"-like dragging.
